img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear
![Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/57/Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg)| Steel Ginseng| Rare | Using the gourd, instantly gains a moderate amount of Focus | Randomly obtained from Aged Ginseng plants | Steel Ginseng
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-goji-shoots.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Black-myth-wukong-goji-shoots.jpg)| Goji Shoots| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Ring of Fire for a short duration | Found in the Upper Hollow in The Webbed Hollow, turn around and go up the stairs till you pass through a hut Inside the hut is the container with the Soak | Goji Shoots
![Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg)| Purple-Veined Peach Pit| Rare | Massively increases the Health recovery from using the gourd when at Critical Health | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed HollowHead towards the lanterns and take a right through the gate Located in the next area with the chests | Purple-Veined Peach Pit
summary_promot:

        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear

        - Following Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-goji-shoots.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Black-myth-wukong-goji-shoots.jpg)| Goji Shoots| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Ring of Fire for a short duration | Found in the Upper Hollow in The Webbed Hollow, turn around and go up the stairs till you pass through a hut Inside the hut is the container with the Soak | Goji Shoots
![Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg)| Purple-Veined Peach Pit| Rare | Massively increases the Health recovery from using the gourd when at Critical Health | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed HollowHead towards the lanterns and take a right through the gate Located in the next area with the chests | Purple-Veined Peach Pit"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a blue crystalline item placed on a wooden tray, likely representing an in-game resource or consumable from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding text, it is part of a collection of rare and epic items that enhance player abilities when used with a gourd, such as increasing defense, focus, or health recovery. The image serves to visually represent one of these collectible items.
